.. _removing_knob_defaults:

Removing a knob default
=======================
There are two ways to remove a knob default and revert to nuke's default value.

Removing a knob default using the main window
---------------------------------------------
Open the `default main window <main_window.html>`_, choose the knob default to remove and press the red **delete** button

.. image:: img/main_window_delete.png

Removing a knob default using the context menu
----------------------------------------------
You can also remove a knob default using the `context menu <adding_knob_defaults.html#using-the-context-menu>`_ that we have seen in the previous chapter.

Right click the knob that you would like to revert to its default and choose **default -> reset**

.. image:: img/context_menu_delete.png
